name: SparklingIce®Maker
0:
”Alexa, launch Sparkling Ice Maker”
”Alexa, open Sparkling Ice Maker”
”Alexa, start Sparkling Ice Maker”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sparkling ice maker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Shake things up for your next party with the Sparkling Ice Maker. Get step-by-step instructions on how to make adult-friendly cocktails created by Sparkling Ice's mixologist. Search recipes by flavor or spirit, and follow along with step-by-step instructions. Cheers!

"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for cocktails"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a cocktail recipe"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for it's favorite cocktail"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker to surprise me"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a new drink"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a recommendation"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a vodka drink"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a gin drink"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a wine drink"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker to make me a drink"
"Alexa, ask Sparkling Ice Maker for a drink"

NOTICE: 
Mature audiences only. This skill is not suitable for all ages. Sparkling Ice Maker provides instructions for making alcoholic drinks and is intended for adults over the age of 21, or the legal drinking age in your country.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
